title: The County clerk
creator_credit: Campbell Harper and Central Office of Information for Scottish Home Department
brief_description: The manifold duties of a Scottish County Clerk. As the administrative centre has to deal, directly or indirectly, with schools, health, housing, libraries and social services of every kind, and with the civil defence, fire services and police requirements of industry.
